data.text: @ClareMalone @AlecStapp The same ProPublica that didn't understand unrealised gains?

@ClareMalone You once said on the 538 podcast that what interested you most about political reporting was power, who has it, how people pursue it, what they do with it. I'd really like to know who's really using crypto as anything besides an investment. Smugglers? Dark web?
@ClareMalone Is that a field that interests you Clare?
